<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<record_update table="x_kasp_lossprevent_lp_questions">
    <x_kasp_lossprevent_lp_questions action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <fields>{ "fields":[
{
         "field":"date_time_of_incident"
     },

{
         "field":"camera_cctv"
     },

{
         "field":"associates_involved"
     },
{
         "field":"witnesses_involved"
     },
{
         "field":"customers_involved"
     },
{
         "field":"focus_store"
     },
{
         "field":"guard_on_duty"
     },

{
         "field":"reason",
         "options":{
             "show":["Alarm Issue","Front/Back Door Unsecured","Lost/Stolen Store Keys","Register Key(s) Missing","Safe Unsecured"],
             "hide":["Cash","Check","Credit Card","Gift Card","Travelers Check","Closing Shift","Associate left store during operating hours","Opening Shift","Alarm Issue","Door Issue","Forgot Personal Item","Family Emergency","Illness","Mall Evacuation","Utility Issue(Water/Sewage/Power)","Weather Related","Scheduling Error","No Call/No Show"]
     }
}

],
"sections":[
{ 
    "section":"incident_info",
    "fields":[
        {"field":"number_of_customers_in_store_at_time_of_incident"},
        {"field":"number_of_associates_working_at_time_of_incident"},
        {"field":"hop_at_time_of_incident"},
        {"field":"preventative_action_s"},
        {"field":"incident_details"}
    ]
}

],

"level_of_priority":"High"
}</fields>
        <question>type_of_issue:Store Security</question>
